message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe it could be an excellent addition to your business or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $1800000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can we meet in the middle at $1500000?
